ComicInfo.Title: Before the Divide
ComicInfo.Summary:
The best-selling Aspen series from creator Siya Oum continues!
Lola and Monarch plan a daring rescue from the Suits by enlisting none other than the deranged cannibals! But, can she count on their true loyalty, or will their desperate plan backfire and end in their bloodshed!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Cover A | Siya Oum | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Marco Lorenzana & Wes Hartman | 2 | C | Direct Market Cover C | Talent Caldwell & Wes Hartman | 3 | D | Direct Market Cover D | Siya Oum | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Edition Cover | Siya Oum | 5 | Note: The digital edition (10/18/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-07 21:10:06. [CVDB630650]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Marco Lorenzana, Siya Oum, Talent Caldwell, Wes Hartman
ComicInfo.Editor: Frank Mastromauro, Gabe Carrasco, Vince Hernandez
